mapper.sql: a.cd_idm AS "cdIdm", a.ksdm AS "ksdm", a.gg_idm AS "ggIdm", a.lc_idm AS "lcIdm", a.kcsl AS "kcsl", a.lsje AS "lsje", a.pfje AS "pfje", a.jxje AS "jxje", a.cfwz AS "cfwz", a.kzbz AS "kzbz", a.tybz AS "tybz", a.tsbz AS "tsbz", a.gzbz AS "gzbz", a.memo AS "memo", a.djsl AS "djsl", a.czyh AS "czyh", a.czrq AS "czrq", a.gldj AS "gldj", a.kzry AS "kzry", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_date AS "createDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO medsto_ykzkc( cd_idm, ksdm, gg_idm, lc_idm, kcsl, lsje, pfje, jxje, cfwz, kzbz, tybz, tsbz, gzbz, memo, djsl, czyh, czrq, gldj, kzry, del_flag, create_by, update_date, update_by, remarks, create_date ) VALUES ( #{cdIdm}, #{ksdm}, #{ggIdm}, #{lcIdm}, #{kcsl}, #{lsje}, #{pfje}, #{jxje}, #{cfwz}, #{kzbz}, #{tybz}, #{tsbz}, #{gzbz}, #{memo}, #{djsl}, #{czyh}, #{czrq}, #{gldj}, #{kzry}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{remarks}, #{createDate} )

INSERT INTO medsto_ykzkc( cd_idm, ksdm, gg_idm, lc_idm, kcsl, lsje, pfje, jxje, cfwz, kzbz, tybz, tsbz, gzbz, memo, djsl, czyh, czrq, gldj, kzry, del_flag, create_by, update_date, update_by, remarks, create_date ) VALUES
( #{item.cdIdm}, #{item.ksdm}, #{item.ggIdm}, #{item.lcIdm}, #{item.kcsl}, #{item.lsje}, #{item.pfje}, #{item.jxje}, #{item.cfwz}, #{item.kzbz}, #{item.tybz}, #{item.tsbz}, #{item.gzbz}, #{item.memo}, #{item.djsl}, #{item.czyh}, #{item.czrq}, #{item.gldj}, #{item.kzry}, #{item.delFlag}, #{item.createBy.id}, #{item.updateDate}, #{item.updateBy.id}, #{item.remarks}, #{item.createDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE medsto_ykzkc SET cd_idm = #{cdIdm}, ksdm = #{ksdm}, gg_idm = #{ggIdm}, lc_idm = #{lcIdm}, kcsl = #{kcsl}, lsje = #{lsje}, pfje = #{pfje}, jxje = #{jxje}, cfwz = #{cfwz}, kzbz = #{kzbz}, tybz = #{tybz}, tsbz = #{tsbz}, gzbz = #{gzbz}, memo = #{memo}, djsl = #{djsl}, czyh = #{czyh}, czrq = #{czrq}, gldj = #{gldj}, kzry = #{kzry}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
